QuestData.Title: Too Many Irons in the Fire
QuestData.Description:
We must not head into battle prematurely. Before we go after Orgrim, we must first deal with his troops.
If we are to succeed in our mission of wiping out the Iron Horde from Talador, we need to start on these shores.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Iron Horde on Orunai Coast.
QuestData.RewardText: We will have fewer enemies to deal with at our backs. Lok'tar.
